location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state of the portable resource at the time the operation was called

secrets.Description: The secret values for the given Mongo database resource

host.Description: Host name of the target Mongo database

port.Description: Port value of the target Mongo database

database.Description: Database name of the target Mongo database

recipe.Description: The recipe used to automatically deploy underlying infrastructure for a portable resource

resources.Description: List of the resource IDs that support the Mongo database resource

resourceProvisioning.Description: Specifies how the underlying service/resource is provisioned and managed. Available values are 'recipe', where Radius manages the lifecycle of the resource through a Recipe, and 'manual', where a user manages the resource and provides the values.

username.Description: Username to use when connecting to the target Mongo database

environment.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the environment that the portable resource is linked to

application.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the application that the portable resource is consumed by

password.Description: Password to use when connecting to the target Mongo database

connectionString.Description: Connection string used to connect to the target Mongo database

name.Description: The name of the recipe within the environment to use

id.Description: Resource id of an existing resource

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state of the portable resource at the time the operation was called

secrets.Description: The secret values for the given Redis cache resource

host.Description: The host name of the target Redis cache

port.Description: The port value of the target Redis cache

tls.Description: Specifies whether to enable SSL connections to the Redis cache

recipe.Description: The recipe used to automatically deploy underlying infrastructure for a portable resource

resources.Description: List of the resource IDs that support the Redis resource

resourceProvisioning.Description: Specifies how the underlying service/resource is provisioned and managed. Available values are 'recipe', where Radius manages the lifecycle of the resource through a Recipe, and 'manual', where a user manages the resource and provides the values.

application.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the application that the portable resource is consumed by

connectionString.Description: The connection string used to connect to the Redis cache

password.Description: The password for this Redis cache instance

url.Description: The URL used to connect to the Redis cache
